text: ek teees varsheey naujavaan kee bhaavanaon se bharee chitthee thee
amit padhane laga
likha tha main abhee berojagaar hoon
naukaree kee talaash kar raha hoon
eme tak padhaee kee hai
gaav mein bahut saaree jameen hai
aise me naukaree na bhee lage tab bhee achchhe se gujarabasar ho raha hai
ladakee ke vishay mein jo apane vigyaapan mein likha hai ki us bechaaree ka pati kainsar se peedit tha
usane sukh dekha hee kya hoga aisee aurat ko sahaara dena mere jaise vyakti ke lie bade saubhaagy kee baat hogee
usakee bhaavanaon ka sahaara ban sakoon yahee meree abhilaasha ban chukee hai
aap apana man bana leejie main seedhe chala aaunga
na mujhe dahej chaahie na aur kuchh
besahaara ko sahaara dena mera param kartavy ban gaya hai
aur adhik na pad saka amit
bhaavanaon mein bah gae yuvak se use pooree sahaanubhooti thee
lekin jeevan ka yah nirnay sirph bhaavanaon ke aavesh mein bahakar nahin liya ja sakata
agala patr baansavaada se aaya tha
paintaalees varsheey vidhur ka
peshe se vah injeeniyar tha
sab kuchh achchha laga
saath mein sanlagn photo dekhakar amit jhemp gaya
paintaalees varsh kee umr to jyaada thee hee saath mein chin dekhakar yoon lagata tha ki vah apanee umr se bhee das varsh bada hai
patr ko poora pade bina hee amit ne use raddee kee tokaree mein daal diya
teesara patr tha dillee ke ek naujavaan ka
umr keval batees varsh peshe se apana kaarakhaana hai likha tha
parivaar ke naam par maanbaap va ek bahan ka jikr tha
shesh koee baat nahee likhee thee
aise mein amit ne us patr ka utar bhej diya
paanch din baad hee javaab aa gaya
ve amit se milana chaahate the
subah hee phon par samay lekar vah priya ko saath lie unake ghar kaalakaajee ja pahuncha
ladake ka daanya haath ekseedent mein tedha ho gaya tha
shesh sab kuchh theek laga
shaadee ke vishay mein poochha to pata laga ki usaka talaak shaadee ke chhah maheene baad ho gaya tha
ladakee beemaar rahatee thee
ladakee ke parivaar vaalon ne sab baaten unase chhipaee thee
aise mein vah kaise yah jhooth bardaasht kar sakate the
talaak ke siva koee chaara nahee tha
baat yaheen tak huee
amit asamanjas mein pad gaya
kuchh samay maang kar vah laut aae
udhar amit se veena ke vishay mein unhen sab pata chal gaya tha
ve log veena se milane ko utsuk the
aananaphaanan vah amit ko batae bina hee deharaadoon pahunch gae
maan nirmala to ekaek poora parivaar aaya dekhakar hee hataprabh thee
ekaek kuchh na kah paee
maan ne masooree veena ko phon par sab baat bataee
veena ka utar sunakar maan kee pareshaanee aur bad gaee
veena ne kaha tha maan yadi aapako sab theek lag raha hai to mujhe kuchh nahee kahana
aap haan kar deejie
aise kaise haan kar doon na main jaanatee hoon unhen na hee amit ko abhee inake baare mein poora pata laga hai
meree maanon tum skool se chhuttee lekar ghar chalee aao
unase mil lo phir samajh lenge
maan nirmala ko veena ka yah vyavahaar kuchh uchit nahin laga
ye kaise bhaav od liye hain veena ne kuchh dekhana nahin chaahatee
maan ko kuchh atapata lag raha hai unaka vyavahaar aur veena hai ki bilkul virakt bhaav se bas haan kahe ja rahee hai
yah pahale vaalee nirmala nahin rahee thee
ab har kadam phoonkaphoonk kar rakhana chaahatee thee
badee chaturaee se usane baat ko sambhaal liya
ladake vaalon se yahee bolakar ek saptaah ka samay maang liya ki agale saptaah prem aa raha hai dillee
vah unhen vaheen milega aur tab tak vah apanee ladakee kee raay bhee pooree tarah se jaan legee aur yadi sab theek hua to ve log dillee aakar vaheen sab tay kar lenge
anamane man se ve sab laut aae
amit ko phon karake maan nirmala ne sab baat vistaar se bata dee
vah bhee unake is vyavhaar se chaunk utha
veena kee haan se adhik use unakee is jaldabaajee ka kaaran jaanane kee bechainee ho uthee
agale hee din vah ladake kee phaiktaree ja pahuncha
phaiktaree kya thee
shaahadara kee ek gandee galee mein ek badee see kharaad kee dukaan
teen masheenen lagee thee aur lagabhag saataath log vahaan mailekuchaile kapade pahane kaam kar rahe the
us samay vah ladaka use vahaan nahin dikha
vaheen saamane ek chaay dukaan par jaakar amit baith gaya
us chaay kee dukan ka maalik ek booda aadamee tha
usee se chaay lekar amit ne use ladake ke vishay mein poochha
bas phir kya tha saara bhed usane khol diya
ladaka teesaree baar shaadee karana chaah raha tha
pahalee beebee usakee paanch varsh pahale mar gaee thee
kaise maree koee nahee jaanata
achchhee bhalee thee aur ek din gais ka stov phat jaane se jal gaee
ek do varsh ka bachcha tha us ka
jo ab kaheen hostal mein pad raha hai
doosaree shaadee huee aur chhah maheene baad talaak ho gaya
pulis ka kes chala tha unake beech
bas
amit aur kuchh nahin sun saka
seedhe ghar pahunch usane sab baat priya se bataee aur deharaadoon phon karake maan ko sankshep mein saaree baat bata dee
saath hee kah diya ki unaka phon aae to kade shabdon mein unhen mana kar den
amit ko samajh aa gaya tha ki duniyaan mein sach par parda daalane vaalon kee kamee nahin hai
ab svayan ko har kadam phoonkaphoonk kar rakhane ke lie taiyaar kar liya tha
yah baat to tal gaee lekin amit ko veena ke vyavahaar se bhee aashchary ho raha tha
vah kaise aankhen moond kar haan kar rahee thee
veena ko patr likhakar poochhana chaahata tha lekin maan nirmala ka patr padhakar use veena kee soch ka khulaasa ho gaya tha
maan ne likha tha ki veena ab yahee kahatee hai ki ladaka jo aapako uchit lage use vah varan kar legee
usase poochhoge ki ladake mein kya dekha jo haan kar rahee ho to usaka javaab hamesha nadaarad paoge
vah har var mein dev dekhana chaahegee aur aise mein use koee bhee pasand nahin aaega
dev kee kasautee par tolane se behatar hai mere parivaar vaale jo uchit samajhenge mere lie vahee var mujhe pasand aa jaega
aise mein sab kuchh soch samajh kar karana hoga
amit ko patr padhakar laga ki veena ke yogy var talaashate hue use na jaane kitana samay lag sakata hai
lekin usane bhee himmat nahin haaree
phir vigyaapan de diya
udhar priya ne use achchhee khabar de dee thee
ghar mein nae mehamaan ke svaagat ke lie bhee vah svayan ko taiyaar karane laga tha
maan ko jab khabar lagee to vah bhee phoolee na samaee
yahee likh bheja dekh lena mera naatee apanee maansee ke lie bhee bahut bhaagyashaalee saabit hoga
dhare se aur rishte aae
aur aise mein ek din kanaada se aae arun ka bhee patr aa gaya
veena ko kanaada mein rah rahe arun se milakar laga ki jaise shesh jeevan jeene ke lie yahee var usake lie uchit hai
is baar haan karane mein usake chehare par virakt bhaav nahin the
thodeekhushee dikhaee dee sabhee ko
